titles.title: Border Hospital Relief Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a grant program regarding the unreimbursed costs of border hospitals in providing emergency medical services to undocumented aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 7/26/2000--Introduced. Border Hospital Relief Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to eligible border hospitals to assist the hospitals with the costs of providing emergency medical services to qualifying undocumented aliens. Authorizes appropriations.
